```{r Map, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(maps)
library(ggrepel)


Study_Sites <- read_csv(here::here("data_raw", "Combined_Site_Coordinates.csv")) %>% 
  rename(Reef = Site)

Aus <- map_data("world") %>% 
  filter(region == "Australia")

cols <- c("Browse Island" = "#CC6666", "Scott Reef" = "#9999CC", "Cocos (Keeling) Islands" = "#66CC99", "Ningaloo Reef" = "#FFCC99", "Houtman Abrolhos" = "grey")

ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(data = Aus, aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group), fill = "grey") +
  geom_point(data = Study_Sites, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude, fill = Reef), ) +
  geom_label_repel(data = Study_Sites, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude, label = Reef_Site, fill = Reef), size = 4, max.overlaps = 40, segment.color = "grey80") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = cols) +
  xlab("Longitude") +
  ylab("Latitude") +
  ylim(-40, -10) +
  xlim(95, 125) +
  labs(caption = "Number of Sites = 19")+
  theme(legend.key = element_rect(fill = "transparent"), panel.grid = element_line(color = "transparent"), legend.position = "bottom", legend.title = element_blank(), axis.title = element_text(size = 12), panel.background = element_rect(fill = "transparent"), axis.line = element_line(color = "black"), plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 12))

ggsave("study sites.png", path = here::here("graphics/Figures"), dpi = 300, scale = 3, limitsize = FALSE)
  
  
  

  

```
